mapper.sql: id, wntid, wnlid, work_state, yuliu1, yuliu2, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName,auditorState,userid
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( wnlid ) FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal WHERE wntid =#{id}

SELECT aww.id, aww.userid, aww.auditorState, awt.worknamesall, awl.workname, awl.id lid, aww.work_state, awa.object_id FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal awt, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary awl, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal aww, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_works_auditor awa WHERE awa.object_id = aww.id and awt.id = aww.wntid AND awl.id = aww.wnlid AND awl.workname LIKE concat('%',#{workname},'%') GROUP BY aww.id DESC

SELECT aww.id, aww.userid, aww.auditorState, awt.worknamesall, awl.workname, awl.id lid, aww.work_state, awa.object_id FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal awt, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary awl, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal aww, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_works_auditor awa WHERE awa.object_id = aww.id and awt.id = aww.wntid AND awl.id = aww.wnlid AND awt.id =#{id} GROUP BY aww.id DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal
id,
wntid,
wnlid,
work_state,
yuliu1,
yuliu2,
createTime,
createName,
updateTime,
updateName,
auditorState,
userid,

mapper.update:
update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal
wntid = #{wntid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wnlid = #{wnlid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_state = #{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yuliu1 = #{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yuliu2 = #{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditorState = #{auditorState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknamelibrary_worknametotal set wntid = #{wntid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wnlid = #{wnlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_state = #{workState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yuliu1 = #{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yuliu2 = #{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
